vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.3.15;
son of: Gera (H1617);
father of: Naaman (H5283J), Ahijah (H0281K), Gera (H1617J), Uzza (H5798H) and Ahihud (H0284)
Another spelling of e.hud (אֵהוּד "Ehud" H0164)
§ Ehud = "united"
great grandson of Benjamin
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以忽 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "聯合"
一名便雅憫人 (代上 8:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以忽 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "联合"
一名便雅悯人 (代上 8:6)
